Classes

class  PACC::SVG::Attribute
 Container for a single style attribute.An attribute is a pair of name/value strings. Its only constructor is protected in order to restrict its usage. It will be sub-classed for specific SVG style attributes. More...
class  PACC::SVG::Style
 List of attributes representing the style of an element. More...

const Attribute PACC::SVG::fontStyle (FontType inType)
 Make font style attribute using type inType.Valid font styles are: eBold, eItalic, eOblique, eUnderline, and eStrike. Types eItalic and eOblique are mutually exclusive. Types eUnderline and eStrike are also mutually exclusive, and may not be supported by all user agents.
